title: Delhi gasps after Diwali: 36 air monitoring stations in 'red zone'; 4 record AQI above 400
content: Delhi's air quality plunged into the 'red zone' on Diwali night as fireworks celebrations extended beyond permitted hours. Most monitoring stations reported 'very poor' to 'severe' pollution levels. Despite Supreme Court-sanctioned green cracker timings, the city's AQI reached 344, with expectations of further deterioration.

title: ‘Never trust an Indian’: Racist, pro-Nazi chat by Trump nominee leaked
content: Leaked chats reveal Paul Ingrassia, Trump's nominee for Special Counsel, made deeply offensive remarks. He disparaged MLK Jr. Day, used racial slurs, and admitted to a "Nazi streak." Ingrassia also expressed views on race and leadership that drew sharp criticism from chat participants, sparking serious debate.

title: Hamas-linked militant from Oct 7 attack granted Muslim accommodations in US jail
content: A suspected Hamas-linked militant, accused in the October 7th Israel attacks, has secured religious accommodations in a Louisiana jail.  Mahmoud Amin Ya’Qub Al-Muhtadi requested and was granted permission for a halal diet, fasting, and daily prayers. He faces charges including material support to a terrorist organization and visa fraud.

title: 'Don't argue': Virat Kohli receives a tough message after Perth duck
content: Former Australian cricketer Matthew Hayden advised Virat Kohli to avoid overthinking and self-arguments after a duck in the first ODI against Australia. Hayden expressed faith in Kohli's exceptional technique and experience, emphasizing his destructive potential with clarity. India pacer Arshdeep Singh also defended Kohli, calling form a mere word for the seasoned batter.

title: 'Rahul ji, get married soon, want wedding order': Gandhi makes sweets at Delhi shop
content: During his trip to Delhi, Rahul Gandhi stopped by the famed Ghantewala sweet shop, rolling up his sleeves to create Imarti and Besan Laddus. Sushant Jain, the jovial shopkeeper, couldn't help but jest, suggesting the Congress leader should settle down soon to place a larger order for wedding sweets.

title: Google DeepMind CEO Hassabis' clear warning on AI: Don't make the mistake of FB and….
content: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis warns of AI's critical inconsistency, where advanced systems excel at complex math but falter on simple problems. This 'jagged intelligence' requires breakthroughs in reasoning and planning, not just more data.  Achieving true Artificial General Intelligence, he suggests, is still years away, demanding better testing and benchmarks to overcome these fundamental flaws.

title: ‘Forced me to undress’: Bengaluru doctor sexually harasses patient at clinic; arrested
content: A Bengaluru dermatologist, Dr. Praveen, has been arrested and remanded in judicial custody following a sexual harassment accusation by a 21-year-old patient. The woman alleges the doctor made inappropriate advances and forced her to undress during a private consultation. Protests erupted outside the clinic after the incident. Police have registered a case under the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita.

title: Mitchell Starc's 176.5 kmph delivery vs India? Top 10 fastest balls in cricket history
content: Mitchell Starc's delivery to Rohit Sharma was mistakenly clocked at a record-breaking 176.5 kmph, sparking social media buzz. The actual speed was 140.8 kmph. This incident brings to mind the fastest recorded deliveries in ODI history, with Shoaib Akhtar leading the pack at 161.3 kmph.

title: Bihar poll drama: Opposition allies climb down, yet face friendly fights; JMM walks out
content: INDIA bloc partners in Bihar are in damage control mode before the first phase of polling, with some withdrawing candidates against each other. Despite internal conflicts and the JMM's exit, leaders hope for clarity by October 23, the last date for withdrawal of candidatures for the second phase.

title: After going for AI agents, laying off 4K employees; Salesforce CEO says: AI doesn't have a soul
content: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff is sending mixed signals on AI's workplace impact. While the company replaced 4,000 customer support roles with AI agents, Benioff claims AI lacks the human touch essential for sales. Despite these cuts, Salesforce is hiring thousands of new salespeople, highlighting a strategic division of AI's application.

title: Musk makes fun of Amazon after AWS outage, says: Even if someone put a gun to ...
content: Following an Amazon Web Services outage that impacted numerous popular apps, Tesla CEO Elon Musk took to X (formerly Twitter) to highlight his platform's resilience. Musk emphasized X's independence from AWS, promoting its encrypted messaging and file transfer capabilities as a reliable alternative. He also shared a repost celebrating X's uptime while other services faced disruptions.

title: Mohsin Naqvi plays musical chairs: Third Pakistan captaincy change in 12 months
content: Shaheen Shah Afridi has been appointed Pakistan's new ODI captain for the upcoming series against South Africa, marking the third leadership change in the format within a year. He takes over from Mohammad Rizwan, who led the team to several series wins before facing challenges in 2025, including a significant defeat in the West Indies.

title: Is Tez Johnson Bo Nix’s adopted brother? Know their NFL story
content: Bo Nix and Tez Johnson share a profound bond, rooted in family and adoption. Tez, facing early hardship, found stability with the Nix family, becoming Bo's adopted brother. This support fueled their shared journey through high school and college football. Now, both brothers have achieved NFL dreams, with Bo drafted by the Broncos and Tez signing with the Buccaneers.

title: Fact Check: Adam Sandler Won’t Join Turning Point USA’s Super Bowl Event
content: A viral rumor claiming Adam Sandler would perform at Turning Point USA's halftime show has been debunked.  Misleading social media posts, amplified by manipulated graphics, falsely linked the comedian to Lara Trump's event.  Sources confirm Sandler remains focused on his comedy and film projects, with no political ties to the organization.

title: It was emotional”: Ayesha Curry on her unexpected journey to motherhood
content: Ayesha Curry, wife of NBA star Stephen Curry, is facing backlash for recent comments on a podcast where she expressed not wanting children or marriage, aiming for a career instead. Her statements, made years after becoming a young mother, have angered fans who perceive them as disrespectful to her husband.

title: Shocking! Chess Grandmaster Daniel Naroditsky dies at 29: Details on his sudden death
content: The chess world mourns the unexpected passing of Daniel Naroditsky, a celebrated 29-year-old Grandmaster and Stanford graduate. Known for his playing prowess, insightful commentary, and educational content, Naroditsky was a prominent figure, earning numerous accolades including the US National Blitz Championship. His passion for chess inspired many globally.

title: 'Why am I under protection?': Envoy says Indians feel 'unsafe' in Canada; cites rising attacks
content: India's High Commissioner to Canada, Dinesh Patnaik, has voiced concerns over the safety of Indians in Canada, noting that even he, as an envoy, requires protection in Canada but his counterpart in India does not. Patnaik spoke about the third attack on Kapil Sharma's cafe and said that Canada can not ignore the situation and call it an Indian problem.

title: Iranian leader slammed after daughter’s 'strapless' wedding dress goes viral
content: A video of Ali Shamkhani's daughter wearing a strapless wedding gown at a luxury hotel has sparked outrage in Iran. Critics accuse the regime of hypocrisy, contrasting the lavish Western-style ceremony with strict hijab laws enforced on ordinary women. The incident highlights perceived double standards for the elite amidst ongoing crackdowns on women's rights.

title: B'luru techie suicide case: Ola CEO booked; family questions mysterious bank transfer
content: An Ola Electric engineer's alleged suicide has led to a criminal case against CEO Bhavish Aggarwal and others. A note reportedly details workplace harassment and mental pressure. The family's suspicion was raised by a large bank transfer post-death, with the company allegedly failing to provide clear answers. Investigations are ongoing.

title: Watch: Trump scolds cameraman over near-miss with 400-year-old WH mirror
content: During a White House meeting with Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese, President Trump cautioned a camera operator against damaging a 400-year-old mirror. The leaders finalized a critical minerals agreement aimed at reducing US reliance on China, with Trump emphasizing its timely completion and the pact's deterrent effect.

title: Guruvayur temple: Ivory, gold, other valuables ‘missing’; poor recordkeeping cited
content: Audits reveal alarming lapses in Guruvayur Devaswom's management of temple valuables, including gold, silver, and ivory. Poor recordkeeping and missing documentation have left precious assets vulnerable to misuse. Despite legal requirements, physical verification of valuables has been neglected for decades, raising concerns about accountability and potential misappropriation.

title: Taylor Swift stuns in red and black as she celebrates Chiefs’ win with Travis Kelce
content: Taylor Swift captivated fans with her stylish appearance at Travis Kelce's steakhouse celebration following the Chiefs' victory. Her chic mini skirt and red top ensemble, paired with signature makeup, drew widespread admiration online. While wedding plans with Kelce are underway, the couple remains discreet about specific details, though Swift has hinted at a significant event.

title: Soy long, America: China buys zero US beans for first time in 7 years; trade war intensifies
content: China has stopped buying US soybeans for the first time in seven years. This leaves American farmers without their biggest buyer. China is now buying more soybeans from South America, especially Brazil and Argentina. This move is part of ongoing trade disputes between China and the US. The situation impacts American farmers as their harvest begins.

title: Don’t ignore these 6 eye symptoms that signal high cholesterol
content: High cholesterol, often a silent condition, can manifest with visible signs around the eyes. Conditions like xanthelasma, corneal arcus, puffy eyelids, dark circles, prominent veins, skin tags, and altered eyelid texture can signal elevated lipid levels. Early recognition of these external markers allows for timely medical evaluation and preventive measures to reduce cardiovascular risks.

title: Watch: Indian-origin journalist teaches Andrew Cuomo correct pronunciation of Mamdani
content: During an MSNBC interview, former Governor Andrew Cuomo mispronounced mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani's name as 'Mandami'. Journalist Anand Giridharadas corrected Cuomo, emphasizing the importance of respecting names in a diverse city. "First of all, governor, it's Mamdani. This is a very big, diverse city you want to lead. We should get the names right," Giridharadas said.

title: Veteran actor Govardhan Asrani passes away at 84
content: Veteran Bollywood actor Govardhan Asrani, affectionately known as Asrani, has passed away at the age of 84. His death was reported around 4 PM on Monday, just hours after he extended Diwali wishes to his followers online. While the exact cause remains undisclosed, it is understood that the beloved actor had been unwell for some time.

title: 'Game recognises game': China copies US tactics; puts tech supply chain in chokehold
content: China is now using American trade tactics. Beijing requires foreign firms to get government approval to export magnets with Chinese rare earth materials. This move mirrors a US policy used to restrict China's access to technology. China is learning from past trade wars and has created its own 'unreliable entity list' and anti-sanction laws.

title: Dinner, songs, yoga & more: How PM Modi spent Diwali with Navy; watch MiG-29s in action
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi celebrated Diwali with Indian naval personnel aboard the indigenously built aircraft carrier INS Vikrant. He witnessed an impressive air power demonstration and interacted with officers and sailors. The Prime Minister emphasized the importance of self-reliance and lauded the courage of the Navy. This visit continues his annual tradition of celebrating Diwali with the armed forces.

title: Trump's 'massive tariffs' warning for India: What's latest on trade talks with US
content: US President Trump has threatened India with "massive tariffs" over its continued oil imports from Russia, a claim New Delhi has firmly rejected. India prioritizes consumer interests and diversified energy sourcing. Meanwhile, India-US trade talks are progressing cordially, aiming to boost bilateral trade significantly by 2030.

title: How just 10 minutes of daily yoga can strengthen your lungs during Diwali season
content: As the festive air fills with joy and lights, it also carries rising pollution levels that strain the lungs. Practising just 10 minutes of focused yoga daily can help strengthen lung capacity, improve oxygen flow, and protect the respiratory system from seasonal pollution.

title: Bihar polls: Tears & kurta-tearing in oppn camp; disunity mars MGB poll campaign
content: Bihar's INDIA bloc faces internal turmoil as nomination deadlines loom, with partners fielding candidates against each other and no resolution in sight. This discord contrasts sharply with the NDA's robust campaign. Meanwhile, ticket denials have sparked dramatic protests across the state, with disgruntled aspirants expressing deep anguish and betrayal just weeks before polling begins.

title: Cops: Ex-RB Martin died in custody after break-in
content: Former NFL All-Pro running back Doug Martin died in police custody after he was involved in a break-in at an Oakland residence, police said.

title: Buccaneers lose WR Evans to broken collarbone
content: Buccaneers receiver Mike Evans suffered a broken collarbone and concussion Monday night at Detroit and will be out most of the year, according to coach Todd Bowles.

title: Sources: Graham, Eagles finalizing deal to reunite
content: Defensive end Brandon Graham has decided to come out of retirement and is finalizing a deal to rejoin the Eagles this week, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter on Monday.

title: Broncos LB Greenlaw suspended 1 game by NFL
content: Broncos linebacker Dre Greenlaw was suspended one game by the NFL for unsportsmanlike conduct toward a referee following Sunday's game against the Giants.

title: Nicklaus awarded $50 million in defamation suit
content: A Florida jury on Monday awarded Jack Nicklaus $50 million in his defamation lawsuit against Nicklaus Companies, which is owned by billionaire banker Howard Milstein.

title: QB Jackson still out as Ravens return from bye
content: Lamar Jackson, who is dealing with a hamstring injury, did not practice Monday, creating uncertainty about whether he will be available Sunday.

title: Pacers extend Nesmith on 2-year, $40.4M deal
content: Pacers forward Aaron Nesmith agreed to a two-year, $40.4 million contract extension with the franchise through the 2028-29 season.

title: The World Series matchup is set! How the Blue Jays, Dodgers can win it all
content: It's the defending champs vs. a franchise that hasn't won in three decades. Here's your first look at an L.A.-Toronto showdown.

title: NBA 2025-26 season preview: Rankings, predictions and what to know for all 30 teams
content: What do you need to know for all 30 NBA teams for the 2025-26 season? Here are the stars, stats and bets ahead of opening night.

title: Who we can (and can't) trust after Week 8 of the college football season
content: Parity has been the theme of the season, making it hard to know what's what. Bill Connelly is here to help.

title: Barnwell: We thought we knew the Chiefs, Bills, Jaguars and Colts -- but we were wrong
content: Remember when we thought the Chiefs' offense was toast? That the Colts would fizzle? The Jaguars would be OK, and the Bills were an AFC lock? Well ...

title: What's next for OKC? Three paths forward for SGA and the champs
content: ESPN analyst Zach Kram breaks down whether Oklahoma City is past, in or entering the best version of its roster.

title: Biggest takeaways from Week 7: Thumbs-up for the 49ers, Colts, Chiefs; thumbs-down for the Jets, Dolphins
content: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions out of each game. Here's what we learned from Week 7.

title: Let's overreact to Week 7: Will the Vikings regret moving on from Sam Darnold?
content: We sized up overreactions, including fantasy football. Did the Vikings err at QB, and are the Chiefs the AFC favorite?

title: UFC's most dominant heavyweight ever hasn't even fought for the title
content: Tom Aspinall isn't the greatest or most accomplished UFC heavyweight, but his suffocating résumé is hard to deny.

title: Time for Liverpool to panic? Plus: Barça win lucky, Bayern claim Der Klassiker, more
content: Man United's win at Liverpool shows the extent of the Reds' issues, though United aren't in the clear yet. Also, Bayern win Der Klassiker, Barcelona get lucky ahead of the Clasico, and more.

title: How Marcus Rashford has revitalized his career at Barcelona
content: At 27, Rashford should be entering his prime. And his move to Barça has seemingly reinvigorated his career.

title: Surviving bye-mageddon: Top waiver-wire options range from old (Flacco) to new (Monangai)
content: Highlighting available free agent options after a weekend of surprising performances ahead of Week 8.

title: Winners and losers: Nix, McCaffrey, Eagles WRs soar; Jeanty's season low
content: Bo Nix, A.J. Brown and Ja'Marr Chase led the way in Week 7, while Caleb Williams and Ashton disappointed.

title: 'Checkdown Charlie' to 'State Farm' actor: Who said it? Take Week 7's NFL quote quiz
content: Week 7 in the NFL offered up-front quotes and self-reflection. Put your knowledge to the test with our quote quiz.

title: NFL Week 7's top performance? Check the fan-voted 'Himmy' Award leaderboard
content: Joe Flacco, Micah Parsons, Jonathan Taylor or Christian McCaffrey -- who deserves Week 7's "Himmy" Award?

title: From zero to 33: How the Broncos pulled off an unlikely fourth-quarter comeback win
content: The Broncos went from being shut out for three quarters to scoring 33 in the fourth for a win that won't be forgotten.

title: How another round of top-10 losses shakes up playoff, bowl matchups
content: We project who will play where through the national title game as we move into the season's second half.

title: Ranking men's college basketball impact newcomers: The top 50 transfers, freshmen
content: Who will have the biggest impact in their first season with a team? Here are the top newcomers for 2025-26.

title: NFL Week 8 betting lines: Colts huge favorites; Rodgers, Steelers underdogs to Packers
content: Aaron Rodgers and the Steelers are home underdogs to the Packers, and Bears-Ravens has the highest total for Week 8.

title: First bets for Week 8: Revenge for Rodgers, a Giants rebound, more
content: What lines offered immediate value once odds came out? Here are four early bets and a futures wager to track.

title: How will McLaren combat Verstappen's surging title threat? Keep calm
content: Max Verstappen is taking large chunks out of the once-insurmountable championship leads of Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris. Can McLaren right the ship?

title: MLS Cup playoffs: Bet against Messi, Miami at your own peril
content: The regular season is in the rearview mirror and the playoffs are upon us, so which postseason contenders are best placed for a run to MLS Cup?

title: NWSL: Marta has Orlando looking ominous again
content: Marta's was in fine form at the weekend, helping Orlando to a win that catapults the Pride up our list.

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Transfer rumors, news: PSG, Inter to vie for Cologne wonderkid Said El Mala
content: Said El Mala has attracted the attention of Paris Saint-Germain and Inter Milan. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Truckers, commercial vehicle operators call for 4-day strike to protest bad roads in Mizoram
content: The blockade will be spearheaded by the Kolasib unit of the Mizoram Tipper Association (MTA) and Joint Action Committee (JAC) of drivers and owners of commercial vehicles in Kolasib town

title: 33 nominations filed for bypolls in two Assembly segments in Jammu and Kashmir
content: The officials said 20 candidates, including eight independents filed their nominations from Budgam constituency where National Conference has fielded former minister Aga Syed Mehmood Al-Mousvi, BJP Aga Syed Mohsin Mosvi and PDP Aga Syed Muntazir Mehdi

title: Bihar Assembly polls: RJD's Sasaram candidate arrested after filing nomination
content: This was the third incident of contesting candidates of the constituents of INDIA bloc being arrested after filing their nomination papers.

title: Bihar Assembly polls: Filing of nomination papers over; INDIA bloc looks fractured
content: The Congress is contesting altogether 61 seats, five less than the number it had contested in 2020, when it had won only 19 and the dismal strike rate was blamed for the inability of Mahagathbandhan to win a majority

title: European Council approves ‘New Strategic EU-India Agenda’, efforts to conclude FTA
content: The council called on the European Commission to take forward the articulation and implementation of this ‘New Strategic EU-India Agenda’ on the basis of the priorities set out in the Joint Communication last month

title: Dibrugarh-bound Air India Express flight returns to Guwahati after developing technical snag
content: A different aircraft was arranged and flight IX-1186 flew from Guwahati and reached Dibrugarh at 6:20 p.m.,” an official said.

title: Low pressure brewing over Bay of Bengal, Odisha to receive rainfall for next three days: IMD
content: According to the IMD, the weather system is expected to move west-northwestwards and intensify into a depression over central parts of south Bay of Bengal and adjoining westcentral Bay of Bengal over the next 48 hours

title: NC will fight Assembly bypolls in Nagrota, Budgam on public issues: J&K Deputy CM
content: We will fight the elections on the issues being faced by the people and restoration of statehood is the biggest issue for us, says J&K Deputy Chief Minister

title: Assam Police team reaches Singapore to probe Zubeen Garg's death
content: The Assam Police’s SIT is collaborating with the Singapore counterpart to investigate the singer-songwriter’s death

title: Heavy rain lashes high ranges of Kerala; orange alert in four districts
content: The high ranges of southern Thiruvananthapuram and northern Kozhikode districts experienced widespread rains and overcast climate throughout the day

title: India rapidly emerging as global hub for services exports: NSE
content: "India will be to services, what China has been to manufacturing. It is emerging as global hub for services exports," NSE chief economist Tirthankar Patnaik said

title: Jammu and Kashmir bypolls: NC, BJP candidates file nominations for Budgam
content: While the National Conference has named veteran Shia leader Aga Mehmood as its candidate, the BJP has fielded Syed Mohsin. The PDP has also announced its candidate, Aga Muntazir Mehdi

title: Karnataka Deputy CM Shivakumar asks BJP for evidence on fundraising allegations ahead of Bihar polls
content: BJP MPs Jagadish Shettar and B.Y. Raghavanedra alleged that the ruling Congress was involved in fundraising for the Bihar elections, leading to increase in corruption in the State

title: CM Adityanath offers prayers at Hanuman Garhi Temple in Ayodhya
content: CM Adityanath offered prayers at the Ram Darbar for the progress of the State and for the welfare of the public, the Uttar Pradesh government said in a statement

title: Case against Ola Electric founder, senior officials after death of employee
content: The company statement also said that “Ola Electric is fully cooperating with the authorities in their ongoing investigation and remains committed to maintaining a safe, respectful, and supportive workplace for all employees,” the statement added

title: Bihar Assembly polls: JMM says it won’t contest, blames ‘political conspiracy’ by Congress-RJD for decision
content: Senior JMM leader Sudivya Kumar said his party will review the alliance in Jharkhand with the Congress and RJD, and give a befitting reply to the “snub”

title: Sabarimala gold ‘theft’: SIT to submit first progress report to Kerala HC
content: Officials said the report will cover the current status of the investigation, including the arrest of Unnikrishnan Potti, who sponsored the gold plating

title: Bihar Assembly polls: RJD releases list of 143 candidates, 24 of them are women
content: The list was released hours before the filing of nomination papers for the second and final phase was to be over

title: IMD issues 'cyclone alert' in Andaman & Nicobar Islands
content: “Local port warnings have been issued in the wake of the weather system, which is likely to cause heavy rainfall till October 23,” officials said

title: Police constable’s killer Riyaz shot dead in police encounter at Nizamabad hospital
content: Riyaz, who was taken into custody on October 19, had been wanted in connection with the murder of 42-year-old constable Pramod, who was stabbed to death while escorting him to a police station in Nizamabad on October 18

title: Early northeast monsoon onset creates ‘triple whammy’ in South India
content: An important problem arises for Tamil Nadu and Kerala when the two phases of the monsoon overlap or if both States experience intense rainfall simultaneously

title: Congress releases another list of 6 candidates for Bihar polls; 60 names declared so far
content: The Congress's list was announced post-midnight, even as a formal seat-sharing deal has alluded the Mahagathbandhan

title: Trump says India to pay ‘massive tariffs’ if it continues to buy Russian oil
content: “I spoke with Prime Minister Modi of India, and he said he's not going to be doing the Russian oil thing,” the U.S. President said

title: Peaceful dialogue only solution to ethnic conflict: Manipur Police chief
content: The DGP said, "These are very challenging times, but we have been trying to tackle them with the best possible strength, and with the cooperation of everyone”

title: Ambulance set on fire amid SDPI-CPI(M) clash in Thiruvananthapuram
content: Tension erupted in the area after SDPI activists allegedly attacked a local CPI(M) leader on Sunday  evening, says police

title: Tej Pratap booked for MCC violation while filing nomination for Bihar polls
content: According to the police, the Janshakti Janta Dal chief used an SUV, bearing a police logo and a beacon light, during a procession for submitting his documents in Mahua

title: PM Modi celebrates Deepavali aboard INS Vikrant, hails armed forces’ unity in Operation Sindoor
content: INS Vikrant is not just a warship but is a testimony to 21st-century India's hard work, talent, impact and commitment, Mr. Modi said

title: India’s jet-lagged fighter fleet
content: Over the last decade, the Indian Air Force has been asking for a new generation of fighter jets. With the MiG-21 now decommissioned, the number of squadrons that fly fighter jets is 70% lower than the sanctioned strength. Delay in indigenous manufacture and international procurement is the reason behind the ‘immediate gap’

title: Better future for India in medicine means embracing immunology today
content: The strength of Indian medicine has traditionally been its clinical acumen and ability to manage vast numbers of patients. However, to truly participate in and benefit from the coming age of immuno-medicine, a robust foundation in immunology education is not a luxury: it’s an urgent necessity

title: Both YSRCP and TDP are equally destructive forces, alleges Congress leader Thulasi Reddy
content: While the YSRCP government left the State buried in debt, crime, liquor, drugs, and cannabis, the coalition government made things worse by taking record loans of ₹1.5 lakh crore in 16 months and burdening electricity users with ₹15,480 crore in surcharges

title: Container Road still a death trap for motorists
content: Traffic congestion on Goshree bridges, lack of adequate streetlights and alleged unscientific road and junction designs are cited by local people as major causes behind accidents on Container Terminal Road

title: TNSDA completes the first phase of underwater survey off the Poompuhar coast
content: A team of 10 divers carried out the survey, which began on September 20 and continued for 12 days. The department is planning one more phase of exploration when the sea conditions are favourable

title: Karnataka invites ETH Zurich’s quantum pioneer to next Quantum India Summit in Bengaluru
content: The State government has deepened its international scientific engagement with ETH Zurich — one of the world’s leading institutions in quantum science and technology — through a visit to the ETH Quantum Center and an invitation for its leadership to participate in the Quantum India Summit 2026 in Bengaluru.

title: Trinamool leaders follow Abhishek, donate for flood relief in North Bengal
content: The WB government has sought donations under West Bengal State Disaster Management Authority (WBSDMA) Fund for flood relief. Abhishek Banerjee donated ₹1 lakh for flood relief, calling upon everyone to rise to the occasion and help rebuild shattered lives.

title: NC, PDP, BJP field members of the Shia clergy for J&K Assembly bypolls
content: This is the first time that Budgam, which has a sizable Shia population, will see three candidates from the Shia clergy contesting the by-polls

title: "He Was Treated Poorly": Biden's Ex Press Secretary Slams Democrats
content: A former White House press secretary has said that she was in utter shock and dismay when then-President Joe Biden informed his team he would not be running in 2024.

title: Delhi's Air Quality 'Very Poor' After Night Of Fireworks On Diwali
content: The national capital Delhi woke up to 'very poor' air after a night of fireworks on Diwali, with the Air Quality Index (AQI) recorded at 347 at 7am.

title: Delhi's Air Quality Worsens On Diwali; 34 Out Of 38 Stations In 'Red Zone'
content: Delhi's air quality deteriorated on Diwali, with 34 out of 38 monitoring stations recording pollution levels in the 'red zone' on Monday, indicating 'very poor' to 'severe' air across the national capital.

title: US Supreme Court To Consider If Regular Marijuana Users Can Own Guns
content: The US Supreme Court said on Monday that it will consider whether people who regularly smoke marijuana can legally own guns, the latest firearm case to come before the court since its 2022 decision expanding gun rights.

title: Dibrugarh-Bound Air India Express Flight Returns To Guwahati Due To Technical Snag
content: A Dibrugarh-bound Air India Express flight on Monday returned to Guwahati after developing a technical snag, and later flew to its destination following rectification of the problem, officials said.

title: 37-Year-Old Man Dies By Suicide In A Mall In Bengaluru
content: A 34-year-old man allegedly died by sucide by jumping from the third floor of a mall here on Monday morning, police said.

title: Crackers, Diyas And Sweets: How India Celebrated Diwali 2025
content: Millions across India lit up their homes and streets as the country celebrated Diwali, the festival of lights. The annual celebration, one of Indias biggest festivals, brings together families, friends and communities in a spirit of joy.

title: 17-Year-Old Girl, On Way To Coaching Institute, Kidnapped By Minor Classmate
content: A case has been registered against a minor boy for allegedly kidnapping a 17-year-old girl in the Bairia police station area here, police said on Monday.

title: Punjab Records Over 300 Cases Of Stubble Burning Since September 15
content: The number of stubble burning incidents in Punjab has reached 308, with Tarn Taran and Amritsar districts accounting for the majority of such cases, according to the Punjab Pollution Control Board data.

title: Man, 55, His Nephew, 21, Shot Over Drain Water Dispute In Greater Noida
content: Two men were allegedly shot dead following a dispute over the flow of drainage water in a village in Greater Noida on Monday, police said.

title: As Israel Bombards Lebanon Post-Ceasefire, Similar Fate For Gaza Predicted
content: The bombardment of a construction equipment business killed a Syrian passerby, wounded seven people including two women, and destroyed millions of dollars' worth of bulldozers and excavators.

title: Israeli Firm Hired To Probe Louvre Jewellery Heist? Museum Says This
content: The management of the Louvre museum denied on Monday having contacted a private Israeli intel firm to investigate the weekend's audacious jewel heist at the iconic French institution.

title: Why JMM Dropped Out Of Bihar Contest Days After Declaring It Would Go Solo
content: Hemant Soren's Jharkhand Mukti Morcha or JMM has announced that it would not contest the assembly elections in Bihar, a day after declaring that it would go solo and contest six seats in the neighbouring state

title: EU Looking For 'Creative Ways' To Keep Russia's 'Shadow Fleet' In Check
content: The European Union is looking to increase the ability of its member states to carry out inspections on Russia's "shadow fleet" of ageing oil tankers, officials said on Monday.

title: Hamas Meets Qatar, Egypt Officials In Cairo To Discuss Gaza Ceasefire
content: A Hamas delegation was to meet Qatari and Egyptian officials in Cairo on Monday to discuss the continuation of a fragile Gaza ceasefire.

title: Tamil Nadu Toddler's Finger, Stuck In Idli Tray, Removed In 90-Minute Op
content: A toddler's finger got stuck in an idli tray, prompting fire brigade officials to launch an operation that lasted over an hour.

title: "Country On Verge Of Liberation From Naxal-Maoist Terror": PM Modi
content: India is on the verge of eradicating Naxal-Maoist terror and more than 100 districts freed from this scourge will celebrate Diwali with dignity this year, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Monday.

title: "Keep Dreaming": Iran's Khamenei Dismisses Trump's Nuclear Sites Claims
content: Iran's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, on Monday rebuffed claims by US President Donald Trump that the Islamic Republic's nuclear sites had been destroyed by US strikes in June.

title: Israel Says Key Border Crossing Into Gaza Reopened For Aid
content: Israel's Kerem Shalom border crossing into Gaza reopened for aid on Monday, an Israeli military official said, a day after Israel closed it, accusing Hamas of violating an ongoing ceasefire.

title: "Get Married Soon, We're Waiting": Delhi Sweet Shop Owner To Rahul Gandhi
content: Following Rahul Gandhi's visit to historic Ghantewala sweet shop in Old Delhi on the occasion of Delhi, Owner Sushant Jain said that he told the LoP during his visit to the shop that they were waiting to see him married in order to get married

title: DGP appointment row: second contempt petition moved against Tamil Nadu government
content: In his petition, Madurai-based rights activist Henri Tiphagne says the action of the State was violative of the guidelines laid down by the Supreme Court in the Prakash Singh case

title: Mullaperiyar dam opened; Idukki and Theni face rain havoc
content: Man killed as intense overnight rain inundates roads and homes, triggers mudslides in Idukki; Tamil Nadu’s Theni district bordering Idukki too bore brunt of downpour; farmer dies in Virudhunagar after being washed away on flooded causeway

title: West Bengal BJP leader labels protesters ‘Bangladeshis who will be expelled in SIR’
content: The Nandigram BJP MLA who has been drumming up support for the Special Intensive Revision said that names of the ‘Bangladeshi Muslims’ who were behind the attack on his vehicle will be removed from the voter list after the SIR

title: Do cash transfers build women’s agency in India?
content: There is a need to ensure that women do not only receive money but also control, grow, and sustain it for their own advancement

title: 146 species recorded in Kaziranga bird survey
content: The avian count timed with Kati Bihu was conducted across five key locations of the Kaziranga National Park and the adjoining Laokhowa Wildlife Sanctuary

title: Bihar Assembly polls: PM Modi to launch election campaign from Karpoorigram
content: Bihar BJP State president Dilip Jaiswal said that PM would address an election rally in Begusarai on October 24

title: Low-pressure area likely over southeast Bay of Bengal by October 21: RMC
content: Under its influence, enhanced rainfall activity is likely over north Tamil Nadu and Puducherry between October 22 and 24

title: Fronts without faces: grand alliance, NDA reluctant to name CM candidate
content: Congress has not confirmed RJD ally Tejashwi Yadav as mahagathbandhan’s CM face; BJP has not confirmed CM and JD(U) chief Nitish Kumar as NDA’s choice; RJD, Congress candidates to clash in a dozen seats

title: Dynasts matter when it comes to Bihar elections, list of parties full of politicians' kin
content: Experts say that no party in Bihar can claim moral superiority on this ground as far as dynasts entering politics is concerned

title: Giriraj Singh’s remarks against Muslims trigger political row in Bihar

title: PM Modi to face Quad, BRICS leaders at ASEAN meet next week

title: IT Minister Lokesh exhorts Telugu diaspora in Australia to join efforts to rebuild Andhra Pradesh
content: The coalition government has development and welfare as twin priorities, and it is striving to achieve the objectives with utmost dedication, he says, adding that ‘one State, one capital, and decentralised development’ is its mission

title: Army Chief celebrates Deepavali with troops in forward areas; reaffirms operational readiness and civil-military synergy in Central Sector
content: During his visit to forward posts in Pithoragarh and adjoining areas, the COAS lauded the soldiers’ indomitable spirit and commitment to duty under extreme climatic and challenging terrain conditions

title: RSS route march in Sedam taken out despite curbs
content: Dramatic scenes unfolded as hundreds of uniformed RSS workers gathered and began their route march at 3 p.m. as scheduled

title: Andhra Pradesh is recovering, thanks to Centre’s support, says Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: The State government is implementing the Super Six schemes, besides giving many benefits beyond the schemes, he says

title: Four killed in a blast at a house in Avadi where country-made firecrackers were stored
content: The house on Vivasaya Street at Thandurai near Pattabhiram  also functioned as a shop selling country-made firecrackers. The concrete roof and a few other portions of the house collapsed in the explosion that occurred around 3 p.m.

title: Thiruvananthapuram gears up for Kerala School Sports Meet
content: Event will be held across 12 venues from October 21 to 28. Nearly 20,000 athletes, including participants from inclusive sports categories, will compete

title: Watch: Chirag Paswan: The art of the deal | Talking Politics
content: Both the BJP and JD(U) have been allocated 101 seats each, while the Rashtriya Lok Morcha (RLM) led by Upendra Kushwaha and the Hindustani Awam Morcha (Secular) led by Union Minister Jitan Ram Manjhi have been allocated six seats each. Mr. Paswan also took a dig at the INDIA bloc, known as ‘Mahagathbandhan’ in Bihar, claiming that “there is so much infighting among the Opposition alliance partners”.

title: Bihar Assembly polls: Denied ticket to contest, candidates allege demands for money in the INDIA bloc
content: Congress’s Mohammad Afaque Alam’s demanded an investigation by Rahul Gandhi; the RJD’s Madan Prasad protested outside former CM Rabri Devi’s residence, and Ritu Jaiswal said she would contest as an independent candidate

title: Plan to privatise medical education and healthcare through PPP violates constitutional right to life, says former IAS officer P.V. Ramesh
content: He accuses the Andhra Pradesh government of using financial constraints as a pretext to divert pubic assets to its associates

title: RSS route march in Chittapur: Karnataka High Court directs Kalaburagi district administration to give report indicating action taken in according permission for November 2 pathasanchalana
content: The High Court of Karnataka, in a special sitting on Sunday, directed the Kalaburagi district administration to submit a report by October 24 indicating the action taken in according permission for the revised proposal of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) to hold pathasanhalana (route march) in Chittapur on November 2 instead of October 19, as was proposed earlier.

title: National lighting workshop illuminates Sangeetha Nataka Akademi
content: As many as 25 participants from across India participate in the workshop, which will conclude on October 24

title: Four districts in Kerala have recurrent summer water stress, says CWRDM study
content: As much as 24.74% of the wards in Kasaragod, 22.01% in Thiruvananthapuram, 20.72% in Pathanamthitta, and 20.48% in Kozhikode are experiencing water shortage in summer months

title: It is the INDIA bloc, not just MVA, which must decide on any new alliance partner in Maharashtra: State Congress chief
content: His statement comes amidst rumours of an alliance between Shiv Sena (UBT), MNS; Constitutional values non-negotiable, Congress will not tolerate polarisation of any kind, says State party chief

title: MNS chief Raj Thackeray claims 96 lakh fake voters in Maharashtra, demands poll roll overhaul

title: India records extreme rainfall during southwest monsoon 2025
content: 45% of india's landmass experienced extreme rainfall during this season . southwest monsoon of 2025 recently concluded with ‘above-normal’ rainfall, amounting to 108% of the long-period average . this is the second consecutive year in last decade to record above-normal rainfall .

title: Rain batters onion crop: Spent Rs 66k, Pune farmer gets Rs 664 for 7.5 quintals
content: Sudam Ingle received just Rs 664 for 7.5 quintals of onions this season . he spent another Rs 1,500 to pack and transport it to the Purandar market yard for sale on friday . his story is echoed across farmlands where relentless rains and collapsing prices have left farmers struggling .

title: Springer's clutch three-run HR helps secure Blue Jays' ticket to World Series
content: the blue Jays are moving on to face the los Angeles Dodgers in the fall Classic . the team took an early lead in Game 7 off home runs from Julio Rodriguez and Cal Raleigh . a three-run home run from George Springer put the Jays up for good .

title: Source: Titans releasing veteran WR Lockett
content: NASHVILLE, Tenn. -- The  Titans  are releasing veteran wide receiver  Tyler Lockett , a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter. Lockett, 33, asked for his release and was granted it Monday, the source said. Lockett is expected to be free to sign with another team after 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday. Lockett signed a one-year deal worth up to $6 million with the Titans in April. Tennessee had hoped Lockett would bring a veteran presence to the receiver room and help rookie quarterback  Cam Ward  get acclimated to the NFL. Lockett caught 10 passes for 70 yards in seven games while playing 181 (44.7%) offensive snaps. The Titans are 1-6 and last week fired coach Brian Callahan. Lockett spent the first 10 years of his career with the  Seattle Seahawks  and became the second-most-prolific pass catcher in franchise history. The Seahawks released him in March.

title: 🏈 College Football Power Rankings: Bama rises
content: Georgia quarterback Gunner Stockton delivers in a big moment once again in the win over the Rebels . the bulldogs are gaining steam in the college football playoff race . a team of top players is gaining momentum in college football .
